# Learning Rust

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/learning-rust
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/learning-rust
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install learning-rust
learning-rust <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g learning-rust
learning-rust <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
